Patient Summary

The Patient Summary provides an overview of patient data from a particular time period to help clinicians monitor patient progress and communicate key information. Users can generate a summary whenever needed, for example at the start or end of a shift. Users can also add different types of notes to a report. If a suitable link is available, users can send streamlined reports to the Hospital Information System (HIS).

A summary can include the sections listed in the following table.

What you
can configure

l Sections to include in the report.

Configure sections for a report

l Tables for real-time data.

Add a real-time data table

l Tables for laboratory results.

Add a laboratory table

l The order of data tables in a report.

Change the order of data tables

l Viewing periods that users can select when creating reports.

Configure viewing periods for the report

l Note types available to users.

l Create or modify a note typeYou can allow users to send streamlined reports to the HIS and configure the different possible report types.

Create or modify a note type
